Sentencas: Recent developments in solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFC) that electrochemically oxidize hydrocarbon fuels to produce electrical power without first reforming them to H-2 are described.
Titulo: Novel SOFC anodes for the direct electrochemical oxidation of hydrocarbons

Sentencas: First, the operating principles of SOFCs are reviewed, along with a description of state-of-the-art SOFC designs.
Titulo: Novel SOFC anodes for the direct electrochemical oxidation of hydrocarbons

Sentencas: This is followed by a discussion of the concepts and procedures used in the synthesis of direct-oxidation fuel cells with anodes based on composites of Cu, ceria, and yttria-stabilized zirconia.
Titulo: Novel SOFC anodes for the direct electrochemical oxidation of hydrocarbons

Sentencas: The discussion focuses on how heterogeneous catalysis has an important role to play in the development of SOFCs that directly oxidize hydrocarbon fuels.
Titulo: Novel SOFC anodes for the direct electrochemical oxidation of hydrocarbons
